Work seamlessly with Bitbucket from the command line.

Usage: bt <command>

Commands:
  version    Show version information
  auth       Authenticate bt and git with Bitbucket
  run        View and manage pipeline runs
  repo       Manage repositories
  pr         Manage pull requests
  api        Make authenticated API requests
  browse     Open repository in browser
  config     Manage configuration
  status     Show status of relevant issues, pull requests, and notifications

Flags:
  -h, --help            Show context-sensitive help.
  -v, --verbose         Enable verbose output
      --config=STRING   Config file path ($BT_CONFIG)
  -o, --output="table"  Output format
      --no-color        Disable colored output
